languages.text: {n}Вокс оживает и из него раздается обеспокоенный голос Вигдис.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, нашим разведчикам удалось перехватить некую запись, активно использующуюся врагами Империума для пропаганды и поднятия смуты среди населения". {n}Немного замявшись, Вигдис добавляет:{/n} "Это фрагменты вокс-трансляции казни Владайма Токары, бывшего Наместника Футфола. Инфопластина с записью уже доставлена в ваш кабинет, если вы желаете с ней ознакомиться".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вокс оживает и из него раздается обеспокоенный голос Вигдис.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, нашим разведчикам удалось перехватить некую запись, активно использующуюся врагами Империума для пропаганды и поднятия смуты среди населения". {n}Немного замявшись, Вигдис добавляет:{/n} "Это фрагменты вокс-трансляции казни Владайма Токары, бывшего Наместника Футфола. Инфопластина с записью уже доставлена в ваш кабинет, если вы желаете с ней ознакомиться".

languages.text: {n}The vox comes to life and emits Vigdis's worried voice.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, our reconnaissance has intercepted a certain recording actively used by the enemies of the Imperium to spread propaganda and sow discord among its people." {n}After a moment of hesitation, she continues,{/n} "The recording contains fragments of the vox-transmitted execution of Vladaym Tocara, the former Liege of Footfall. The data-slate with the recording has already been delivered to your quarters in case you wish to study it."
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс оживает и из него раздается обеспокоенный голос Вигдис.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, нашим разведчикам удалось перехватить некую запись, активно использующуюся врагами Империума для пропаганды и поднятия смуты среди населения". {n}Немного замявшись, Вигдис добавляет:{/n} "Это фрагменты вокс-трансляции казни Владайма Токары, бывшего Наместника Футфола. Инфопластина с записью уже доставлена в ваш кабинет, если вы желаете с ней ознакомиться".

traits.locale_text: {n}The vox comes to life and emits Vigdis's worried voice.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, our reconnaissance managed to intercept a certain recording frequently used by enemies of the Imperium for propaganda and setting turmoil among the citizens." {n}After a moment of hesitation Vigdis continues:{/n} "These are the fragments of the vox-transmitted execution of Vladaym Tocara, a former viceroy of Footfall. The data-slate with the recording has already been delivered to your room in case you want to study it."

{n}The vox comes to life and emits Vigdis's worried voice.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, our reconnaissance managed to intercept a certain recording frequently used by enemies of the Imperium for propaganda and setting turmoil among the citizens." {n}After a moment of hesitation Vigdis continues:{/n} "These are the fragments of the vox-transmitted execution of Vladaym Tocara, a former viceroy of Footfall. The data-slate with the recording has already been delivered to your room in case you want to study it."

{n}The vox comes to life and emits Vigdis's worried voice.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, our reconnaissance managed to intercept a certain recording actively used by the enemies of the Imperium to spread propaganda and sow discord among the citizens." {n}After a moment of hesitation Vigdis continues,{/n} "These are several fragments of the vox-transmitted execution of Vladaym Tocara, a former viceroy of Footfall. The data-slate with the recording has already been delivered to your cabin in case you want to study it."

{n}The vox comes to life and emits Vigdis's worried voice.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, our reconnaissance managed to intercept a certain recording actively used by the enemies of the Imperium to spread propaganda and sow discord among the citizens." {n}After a moment of hesitation Vigdis continues,{/n} "These are several fragments of the vox-transmitted execution of Vladaym Tocara, a former viceroy of Footfall. The data-slate with the recording has already been delivered to your cabin in case you want to study it."

{n}The vox comes to life and emits Vigdis's worried voice.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, our reconnaissance has intercepted a certain recording actively used by the enemies of the Imperium to spread propaganda and sow discord among its people." {n}After a moment of hesitation, she continues,{/n} "The recording contains fragments of the vox-transmitted execution of Vladaym Tocara, the former Liege of Footfall. The data-slate with the recording has already been delivered to your quarters in case you wish to study it."

languages.text: {n}音阵频道响了起来，传来了维格迪斯担忧的声音。{/n}“大人，我们的侦察人员截获了一段录音。这段录音被帝国之敌用来进行宣传，在帝国公民中挑拨离间。”{n}她犹豫了片刻，继续说道。{/n}“这段录音是落脚港的前总督，弗拉迪姆·托卡拉被处决时的录音片段。包含录音的数据板已经送到您的舱室，供您研究。”
languages.original_text: {n}The vox comes to life and emits Vigdis's worried voice.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, our reconnaissance has intercepted a certain recording actively used by the enemies of the Imperium to spread propaganda and sow discord among its people." {n}After a moment of hesitation, she continues,{/n} "The recording contains fragments of the vox-transmitted execution of Vladaym Tocara, the former Liege of Footfall. The data-slate with the recording has already been delivered to your quarters in case you wish to study it."

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵频道响了起来，传来了维格迪斯担忧的声音。{/n}“大人，我们的侦察人员截获了一段录音。这段录音被帝国之敌用来进行宣传，在帝国公民中挑拨离间。”{n}她犹豫了片刻，继续说道。{/n}“这段录音是落脚港的前总督，弗拉迪姆·托卡拉被处决时的录音片段。包含录音的数据板已经送到您的舱室，供您研究。”

languages.text: {n}Le vox s'anime et laisse entendre la voix préoccupée de Vigdis.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, nos équipes de reconnaissance ont intercepté un enregistrement que les ennemis de l'Imperium utilisent pour diffuser leur propagande et semer la discorde parmi son peuple. » {n}Après un moment d'hésitation, elle poursuit :{/n} « L'enregistrement contient des extraits de l'exécution de Vladaym Tocara, l'ancien suzerain de Castel. La plaque de données a d'ores et déjà été livrée dans vos quartiers, au cas où vous souhaiteriez le consulter. »
languages.original_text: {n}The vox comes to life and emits Vigdis's worried voice.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, our reconnaissance has intercepted a certain recording actively used by the enemies of the Imperium to spread propaganda and sow discord among its people." {n}After a moment of hesitation, she continues,{/n} "The recording contains fragments of the vox-transmitted execution of Vladaym Tocara, the former Liege of Footfall. The data-slate with the recording has already been delivered to your quarters in case you wish to study it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vox s'anime et laisse entendre la voix préoccupée de Vigdis.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, nos équipes de reconnaissance ont intercepté un enregistrement que les ennemis de l'Imperium utilisent pour diffuser leur propagande et semer la discorde parmi son peuple. » {n}Après un moment d'hésitation, elle poursuit :{/n} « L'enregistrement contient des extraits de l'exécution de Vladaym Tocara, l'ancien suzerain de Castel. La plaque de données a d'ores et déjà été livrée dans vos quartiers, au cas où vous souhaiteriez le consulter. »

languages.text: {n}Das Vox springt an und lässt Vigdis' besorgte Stimme erklingen.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, unsere Aufklärung hat eine Aufzeichnung abgefangen, die von den Feinden des Imperiums aktiv genutzt wird, um Propaganda zu verbreiten und Zwietracht unter seinen Bewohnern zu säen." {n}Sie zögert kurz und fährt dann fort:{/n} "Die Aufzeichnung enthält Fragmente der Übertragung der Hinrichtung von Vladaym Tocara, dem einstiegen Lehnsherrn von Footfall. Der Datablock mit der Aufzeichnung befindet sich bereits in Eurem Quartier, falls Ihr Euch damit befassen wollt."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox comes to life and emits Vigdis's worried voice.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, our reconnaissance has intercepted a certain recording actively used by the enemies of the Imperium to spread propaganda and sow discord among its people." {n}After a moment of hesitation, she continues,{/n} "The recording contains fragments of the vox-transmitted execution of Vladaym Tocara, the former Liege of Footfall. The data-slate with the recording has already been delivered to your quarters in case you wish to study it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Vox springt an und lässt Vigdis' besorgte Stimme erklingen.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, unsere Aufklärung hat eine Aufzeichnung abgefangen, die von den Feinden des Imperiums aktiv genutzt wird, um Propaganda zu verbreiten und Zwietracht unter seinen Bewohnern zu säen." {n}Sie zögert kurz und fährt dann fort:{/n} "Die Aufzeichnung enthält Fragmente der Übertragung der Hinrichtung von Vladaym Tocara, dem einstiegen Lehnsherrn von Footfall. Der Datablock mit der Aufzeichnung befindet sich bereits in Eurem Quartier, falls Ihr Euch damit befassen wollt."

{n}Das Vox springt an und lässt Vigdis' besorgte Stimme erklingen.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, unseren Aufklärungseinheiten ist es gelungen, eine bestimmte Aufnahme abzufangen. Sie wird aktiv von den Feinden des Imperiums genutzt, um Propaganda zu verbreiten und Zwietracht unter den Bürgern zu säen." {n}Vigdis zögert kurz und fährt dann fort:{/n} "Es handelt sich um mehrere voxübertragene Fragmente mit Vladaym Tocaras Exekution, einem früheren Vertreter von Footfall. Der Datablock mit der Aufzeichnung befindet sich bereits in Eurer Kabine, falls Ihr Euch damit befassen wollt."

languages.text: {n}El voco vuelve a la vida y emite la voz preocupada de Vigdis.{/n} «{mf|Milord|Milady}, nuestro equipo de reconocimiento ha interceptado una grabación usada por los enemigos del Imperium para difundir propaganda y sembrar la discordia entre su gente». {n}Vigdis, mostrándose dudosa, realiza una breve pausa y luego continúa:{/n} «Son varios fragmentos de la transmisión por voco de la ejecución de Vladaym Tocara, el anterior Señor de Paso. Hemos enviado la tablilla de datos a sus aposentos por si quiere examinarla».
languages.original_text: {n}The vox comes to life and emits Vigdis's worried voice.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, our reconnaissance has intercepted a certain recording actively used by the enemies of the Imperium to spread propaganda and sow discord among its people." {n}After a moment of hesitation, she continues,{/n} "The recording contains fragments of the vox-transmitted execution of Vladaym Tocara, the former Liege of Footfall. The data-slate with the recording has already been delivered to your quarters in case you wish to study it."

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco vuelve a la vida y emite la voz preocupada de Vigdis.{/n} «{mf|Milord|Milady}, nuestro equipo de reconocimiento ha interceptado una grabación usada por los enemigos del Imperium para difundir propaganda y sembrar la discordia entre su gente». {n}Vigdis, mostrándose dudosa, realiza una breve pausa y luego continúa:{/n} «Son varios fragmentos de la transmisión por voco de la ejecución de Vladaym Tocara, el anterior Señor de Paso. Hemos enviado la tablilla de datos a sus aposentos por si quiere examinarla».

languages.text: {n}ヴォクスが息を吹き返し、ヴィグディスの心配そうな声が響く。{/n}「陛下、我が偵察隊は、帝国の敵がプロパガンダを広め、市民の間に不和を蒔くために積極的に使用しているある録音を傍受しました」{n}少しの沈黙の後、彼女は続ける。{/n}「その録音には、フットフォールの元領主、ヴラダイム・トカラの処刑のヴォクス通信による断片が含まれています。録音の入ったデータスレートは、すでにご確認用として陛下の私室に届けられております」
languages.original_text: {n}The vox comes to life and emits Vigdis's worried voice.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, our reconnaissance has intercepted a certain recording actively used by the enemies of the Imperium to spread propaganda and sow discord among its people." {n}After a moment of hesitation, she continues,{/n} "The recording contains fragments of the vox-transmitted execution of Vladaym Tocara, the former Liege of Footfall. The data-slate with the recording has already been delivered to your quarters in case you wish to study it."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォクスが息を吹き返し、ヴィグディスの心配そうな声が響く。{/n}「陛下、我が偵察隊は、帝国の敵がプロパガンダを広め、市民の間に不和を蒔くために積極的に使用しているある録音を傍受しました」{n}少しの沈黙の後、彼女は続ける。{/n}「その録音には、フットフォールの元領主、ヴラダイム・トカラの処刑のヴォクス通信による断片が含まれています。録音の入ったデータスレートは、すでにご確認用として陛下の私室に届けられております」

languages.text: {n}Voks dile gelip Vigdis'in endişeli sesini iletmeye başlıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, İmparatorluk düşmanlarınca halk arasında propaganda ve huzursuzluk yaymak için kullanılmakta olan bir kayıt keşfettik." {n}Bir anlık tereddüdün ardından sözlerine devam ediyor.{/n} "Eski Binliman Emîri Vladaym Tocara'nın idamından bazı kısımlar, voks aracılığıyla bu kayda geçirilmiş. Kaydın bulunduğu databelayı incelemek istersiniz diye odanıza bıraktık."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox comes to life and emits Vigdis's worried voice.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, our reconnaissance has intercepted a certain recording actively used by the enemies of the Imperium to spread propaganda and sow discord among its people." {n}After a moment of hesitation, she continues,{/n} "The recording contains fragments of the vox-transmitted execution of Vladaym Tocara, the former Liege of Footfall. The data-slate with the recording has already been delivered to your quarters in case you wish to study it."
